description.en: Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.

altTitles.ja: あなた達それでも先生ですかっ！

description.en: One day, school teachers come as freeloaders to the inn run by his parents!? Kazami Hiro, a high school boy, decides to take care of the inn and his future!? Under one roof, The forbidden harem romantic comedy begins!!
description.ja: 親が経営する旅館にある日、居候としてやってきたのは学校の先生たち!? 男子高校生・風見ヒロは旅館のため、自分の未来のためにお世話をすることに!? 一つ屋根の下、禁断のハーレムラブコメが開幕!!
description.pl: Pewnego dnia nauczyciele przychodzą jako freeloaderzy do zajazdu prowadzonego przez jego rodziców!? Kazami Hiro, uczeń szkoły średniej, postanawia zadbać o zajazd i swoją przyszłość!? Pod jednym dachem rozpoczyna się zakazana haremowa komedia romantyczna!!

altTitles.es-la: El Maestro de la Espada reencarna como un pequeño príncipe. ¡Su Antiguo Discípulo ahora es su tutor!

description.en:
Sword Saint Brise saved the country with his unique swordsmanship.

At the end of his magnificent life, he is reincarnated as the country's youngest prince, still retaining his memories. He seeks freedom again and aspires to enter the elementary school of knight school. Even though he is an invincible swordsman, he unexpectedly fails! 

“I came to get you.”

He looks like a child, but inside he's an invincible former swordsman. In his reincarnation, he is picked up by his former disciple!?

This is a girls love series. When a delinquent and a role model student start dating, they must conceal their relationship because of their reputations. People would be outraged and not approve of such a couple. Even though Alix and Skip are complete opposites like night and day, they manage to maintain a loving relationship.

altTitles.ja: 出会って5秒でバトル

altTitles.th: ศึกเดือด 5 วิพลิกชะตา

description.en:
It was just a usual morning.  
  
Akira Shiroyanagi, a high schooler who loves games and Konpeito (Japanese sweets), is suddenly dragged into a battlefield by a mysterious girl who calls herself Mion. The participants are told that they are "erased from the family register, involved in an experiment, and have gained certain powers."  
  
Akira is determined to win the game with his newfound powers and destroy the organization. Armed with a power no one expects and his "brain" skills, a new era of intelligence battle of begins!

altTitles.ja: 谷仮面

description.en: The story is of a masked boy, Tani, a strong young man, who has a crush on a girl named Shima Rihoko, the school volleyball star. He gets into trouble trying to get her attention, besides facing the thugs of the school. He’s a very jealous guy, and will not let anyone get close to Shima-san.

altTitles.ja: ばっどがーる

description.en:
The daily life of a (self-proclaimed) high school delinquent, fangirling and kohyuuing over the head prefect!?
(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)
Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. 
But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?
A totally not "bad" delinquent girl's 4-koma school life manga!

altTitles.ja: お狐ギャルの片喰さん

description.en:
A very ordinary and serious high school student, Kamou-kun. Though his days are filled with diligent study, his concern lies in his childhood friend, Katabami-san, who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated, Katabami-san's true identity is... a fox spirit!?

---
**Alternative Raw:** [Nico Nico Seiga](https://sp.seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66393)
description.ja:
幼馴染みは…化け狐！？

ごく普通の真面目な男子高校生、賀茂（かも）くん。勉強に励む日々だったが、悩みは幼馴染みの片喰（かたばみ）さんが毎日勉強の邪魔をしてくること。しかも片喰さんの正体は……化け狐だった！？

altTitles.ja: 失敗家族

description.en: A reclusive son, a daughter looking for sugar daddies, and a cheating husband. "This family is a failure." Noriko, a housewife who thinks so, has no dreams or hopes for the future, and her days just pass by. However, her fate changes dramatically when she impulsively kills her husband's boss. "The only way for the whole family to live happily is to hide the body." A strange bond is formed as the broken family cooperates in concealing the body.

altTitles.en: I Have an Apocalyptic Underground City

description.en:
A Female President? Then come help me manage the shelter. A Female Special Forces Soldier? Then come and be the captain of the guards.   
At the end of the world, titles like CEOs, beautiful women, secretaries, electricians, programmers and all other professions are all no longer useful. Don't be afraid to come to my underground system shelter- as long as you are talented people and human beings!   
  
5 consecutive updates will be launched after February 16.

title.en: Ryoushin no Shakkin wo Katagawari shite morau Jouken wa Nihon Ichi Kawaii Joshikousei to Issho ni Kurasu koto deshita.

altTitles.ja: 両親の借金を肩代わりしてもらう条件は日本一可愛い女子高生と一緒に暮らすことでした。

altTitles.en: I'm Gonna Live with You Not Because My Parents Left Me Their Debt But Because I Like You

altTitles.zh: 替我父母偿还债务的条件是与日本最可爱的女高中生同居。

altTitles.zh-ro: Tì wǒ fùmǔ chánghuán zhàiwù de tiáojiàn shì yǔ rìběn zuì kě'ài de nǚ gāozhōng shēng tóngjū.

description.en:
The main character, Yoshizumi Yuya, was being pressured into paying off the debt left by his parents who had fled abroad. It was his classmate, Hitotsuba Kaede, chosen as the cutest schoolgirl in Japan, who saved him from this crisis of life and death. However, there was a catch. The condition required to fulfill in return for taking over his debt was — “In return for the loan, you have – to live with me.”

“Why did that happen?!”

Yuya’s daily life collapsed on this day.

“Yuya-kun. Let’s take a bath together.”

“Yuya-kun, please be my hug pillow.”

“That’s enough, Hitotsuba-san!”

The slapstick love comedy between the beautiful, but easy-going Hitotsuba Kaede and the serious and hard-headed Yoshizumi Yuya, starts now!
description.id: Tokoh utama, Yoshizumi Yuya, dipaksa untuk melunasi hutang yang ditinggalkan oleh orang tuanya yang melarikan diri ke luar negeri. Itu adalah teman sekelasnya, Hitotsuba Kaede, terpilih sebagai siswi terimut di Jepang, yang menyelamatkannya dari krisis hidup dan mati ini. Namun, ada motif tersembunyi di balik itu. Syarat yang harus dipenuhi sebagai imbalan untuk melunasi utangnya adalah — “Sebagai imbalan atas pinjaman itu, kau harus tinggal bersamaku.” “Kenapa jadi begitu?!” Kehidupan sehari-hari Yuya runtuh pada hari ini. “Yuya-kun. Ayo mandi bersama.” “Yuya-kun, jadilah bantal pelukku.” “Cukup, Hitotsuba-san!” Kisah cinta komedi romantis yang menggugah antara Hitotsuba Kaede yang cantik namun santai dan Yoshizumi Yuya yang serius dan keras kepala, dimulai sekarang!
description.ja:
第1巻の内容紹介: 糖度300％の同棲ラブコメ
両親が借金3000万を残して海外逃亡…！？追い詰められた吉住勇也の前に、不意に現れたのは社長令嬢の同級生・一葉楓。勇也も密かに憧れていた日本一可愛い女子高生1位に選ばれた楓は、彼女は意外な提案をするが

Dai 1-kan no naiyō shōkai: Tōdo 300-pāsento no dōsei rabu kome ryōshin ga shakkin 3000 man o nokoshite kaigai tōbō…!? Oitsumerareta Yoshizumi Yūya no mae ni, fui ni arawareta no wa shachō reijō no dōkyūsei 一葉楓. Yūya mo hisoka ni akogarete ita nihon'ichi kawaii mesukōsei 1-i ni eraba reta kaede wa, kanojo wa igaina teian o suruga.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.fr: Ogami Tsumiki et l'étrange vie du quotidien

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami và Cuộc sống diệu kì!

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

In ten or so years, in a future where resurrecting the dead is an everyday occurrence, the moon will collide with the Earth, bringing with it the end.
Before the apocalypse happens, Nekuro confesses to her best friend Kiri, who, seeing no hope for the future, takes her admirer's confession half-joklingly, until one day, Nekuro dies.

description.en:
My mom is the naive and sweet protagonist in a tragic romance novel. My mom is also the substitute lover who escaped from the overbearing President. And I? Well, I'm the five-year-old genius hacker.

Gu Chu, a brilliant hacker, finds herself reborn in a tragic romance novel as a five-year-old cutie. Her mother is the unfortunate heroine, her father is the blind-to-reality President, and they're surrounded by scheming relatives, a two-faced aunt, and various villainous women.

Determined to protect her mother, little Gu Chu stands tall and begins to fight back. What harm could a five-year-old possibly cause? She just wants to protect her mommy and maybe inherit her President daddy's billions along the way.

description.en: After adding Chang and Mario, whose lives he saved in the Salvation Game, to his team, Kaiji arrives at the Teiai warehouse to face off with Kazuya, the son of Teiai Group Chairman Hyoudou. Kazuya begins to explain "One Poker," a gambling game where players play a single card on a machine called "Mother Sophie." Kaiji is stunned by Kazuya's proposal of "one bet of 200 million = one life." The ultimate death match, a gambling game that goes beyond the norm, is about to begin!
description.ru:
После «Спасительной игры» и маджонга «Семнадцать шагов» Кайдзи Ито, имея на руках 400 000 000 йен, решается сыграть в ещё одну игру под названием «Ван Покер» с Кадзуей Хёдо. Кадзуя ставит два миллиарда йен! За кем же будет победа?

(Source: readmanga)

description.en: A psychic high-schooler Tae-rin discovered the story of a ghost one day. After that she realized, humans are more dangerous than ghosts. Tae-rin then decides to help the ghosts get rid of their grudges with her childhood friend, Chang-woo.

altTitles.ja: 龍とカメレオン

description.en:
Garyou Hanagami is a veteran mangaka. Best known for the behemoth of a series that is Dragon Land, Hanagami-sensei has years of experience under his belt and is always thinking up new manga ideas. 

Shinobu Miyama is not. An amateur working for Hanagami-sensei as an assistant, Miyama is nicknamed “The Chameleon” for his ability to copy the artstyles of those he works under. However, his true dream is to escape the faceless crowds and become someone. 

So what happens when a work accident causes them to swap bodies?
description.fr:
Garyou Hanagami est un mangaka chevronné. Il est connu pour son oeuvre Dragon Land, le manga le plus populaire. Hanagami a des années d'expérience à son actif et déborde d'une créativité et d'une énergie folle.

Shinobu Miyama est un dessinateur travaillant pour Hanagami en tant qu'assistant libre. Miyama est surnommé "le caméléon" en raison de sa capacité à copier le style de n'importe quel artiste à la perfection. Cependant, son véritable rêve est de sortir de la masse et de devenir quelqu'un avec une grande renommée.

Suite a un accident, les deux mangaka échangent de corps. Garyou va maintenant devoir battre sa propre oeuvre, dans le corps d'un illustre inconnu.
Une bataille au sommet du manga commence ! 
Entre le dragon qui repart de zéro et le caméléon qui tente d'imiter cet animal céleste ! 

Qui va remporter le titre du meilleur mangaka ?!

description.en:
All the bosses are annoying! The reincarnated strongest magician's trampling and subjugation begins!

Hazen Heim, a newly appointed imperial general, is demoted to the front line because he is a commoner. There were a lot of incompetent people, such as "a trash superior who takes advantage of his position to steal the achievements of his subordinates", "an evil subordinate who keeps bullying people below him", and "a top who is too opportunistic to do anything''. 

However, Hazen has the experience and overwhelming ability as the strongest magician that he cultivated in his previous life. He slaughters his malevolent subordinates in accordance with military law, and completely refutes his superiors who complain. He achieved extraordinary results, such as making peace with a hostile tribe by teaming up with a genius girl, and defeated all the annoying bosses!

An exhilarating upstart fantasy about an unscrupulous superior!
description.ja: 新任帝国将官のヘーゼンは平民出身を理由に最前線に左遷、そこは無能の上官ばかりであった。だが彼には前世で培った、最強魔法使いとしての経験と圧倒的実力がある。

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...
- - -
Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.

Only this time he is accompanied to these 100 worlds by a former companion…
description.es: Ed, a quien se le dio la loca prueba de tener que ser expulsado de la party de 100 héroes en 100 mundos diferentes para poder regresar a su mundo original, finalmente cumpliendo las condiciones puede volver. Sin embargo Ed se entera de que el otro mundo al que quiere regresar ha tenido un final desastroso. Ahora para salvar a una chica elfa quien una vez fue su amiga, tendrá que volver a desafiar una nueva batalla para aprovechar al máximo la "habilidad de expulsión" para cambiar todos los finales de una forma convincente. ¡Comienza una historia para salvar 100 mundos diferentes!
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...

altTitles.hu: Még akkor is, ha a kétségbeesés megvisel

description.en:
Staying alive is a new form of entertainment.
When Dokyung, disillusioned by the harshness of life, finally resolves to call it quits, a bored demon, Hwamyung, appears before her with a particular offer. Will Dokyung, having entered into a contract with the Demon of Disillusionment, be able to flip her disastrous life upside down?

title.en: Sokushi Cheat ga Saikyou Sugite, Isekai no Yatsura ga Marude Aite ni Naranai n desu ga (Fan Colored)

altTitles.en: My Instant Death Ability Is So Overpowered, No One in This Other World Stands a Chance Against Me! (Fan Colored)

description.en:
Growth cheats? Infinite magic power? The ability to utilize all archetypes? What’s the point if instant death ends everything with a single attack?

Awaking to absolute chaos and carnage while on a school trip, Yogiri Takatou discovers that everyone in his class has been transported to another world!

He had somehow managed to sleep through the entire ordeal himself, missing out on the Gift — powers bestowed upon the others by a mysterious Sage who appeared to transport them. Even worse, he and another classmate were ruthlessly abandoned by their friends, left as bait to distract a nearby dragon. Although not terribly bothered by the thought of dying, he reluctantly decides to protect his lone companion. After all, a lowly Level 1000 monster doesn't stand a chance against his secret power to invoke Instant Death with a single thought!

If he can stay awake long enough to bother using it, that is...
description.id:
**Pertumbuhan cheat? Kekuatan sihir tak terbatas? Kemampuan untuk menggunakan semua arketipe? Apa gunanya semua itu jika kematian instan mengakhiri segalanya dengan satu serangan?** 

Saat terbangun dalam kekacauan dan pembantaian saat perjalanan sekolah, Yogiri Takatou menemukan bahwa semua teman sekelasnya telah dipindahkan ke dunia lain! Dia entah bagaimana berhasil tidur selama seluruh kejadian itu, melewatkan pemberian — kekuatan yang diberikan kepada orang lain oleh seorang Sage misterius yang muncul untuk memindahkan mereka. Yang lebih buruk, dia dan seorang teman sekelas lainnya ditinggalkan dengan kejam oleh teman-teman mereka, dijadikan umpan untuk mengalihkan perhatian seekor naga yang sedang mendekat. 

Meskipun tidak terlalu terganggu oleh pemikiran tentang kematian, dia dengan enggan memutuskan untuk melindungi satu-satunya temannya. Lagipula, monster Level 1000 yang rendah tidak ada artinya melawan kekuatan rahasianya untuk memanggil Kematian Instan dengan satu pikiran! 

Jika dia bisa tetap terjaga cukup lama untuk menggunakan kekuatannya itu, tentu saja...

title.en: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms

altTitles.ja-ro: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai

altTitles.en: My Charms Are Wasted on Medaka Kuroiwa

altTitles.ja: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない

altTitles.ru: Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности

altTitles.es-la: Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka

altTitles.zh: 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
description.fr:
Tu ne le sais pas encore, mais tu m’adores !

Mona plaît à tout le monde, c’est comme ça. Son sourire, son allure, sa personnalité… Tout chez elle attire les gens. Dans son lycée, elle fait tourner toutes les têtes. Sauf celle d’un garçon… Medaka. Fraîchement admis dans son école, celui-ci a complètement chamboulé la vie de cette fille à qui nul ni personne n’est censé résister. C’est bien simple : Medaka refuse de la regarder ou se renfrogne à la moindre de ses tentatives de rapprochement. Devant cette insulte à son charme ravageur, Mona décide de tout mettre en œuvre pour le séduire, quitte à se mettre dans des situations où elle-même ne saura plus quoi ressentir ! La tombeuse VS l’insensible : qui craquera en premier ? 

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!!　しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！　「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！　時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?　
モテ女子×禁欲男子のラブコメディ、大勃発――!!
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.

description.en:
Princess Llewelyn, who was once an outstanding princess but was now miserably abandoned. An ugly curse has been placed upon her with no one to protect her. It is a curse that makes her lust for men. In order to stop her curse, Llewelyn opens her bedroom... Four men are entangled with the abandoned princess. Will the truth of the curse be revealed? And who will be the man who will end up with her?

---
**Notes:**
* *The Secret Bedroom of a Dejected Royal Daughter* is the official English title of the Korean novel.
* Naver changed the webtoon's rating from R15 to R19. The novel is still R15, it has never released as R19. Naver R19 rating for the webtoon is more of a mature R17.

La princesse Lewellyn avait tout pour elle. Jusqu'au jour où sa mère s'est fait exécuter pour avoir tenté de maudire le prince héritier. Depuis, elle vit ses jours délaissée par les siens et harcelée par la reine douairière. Elle ne rêve plus que de pouvoir entrer à l'abbaye pour s'échapper du palais et vivre une vie chaste. Mais le dieu démon Asmodeus lui a infligé la malédiction de la luxure, la faisant plonger dans le désir. Parviendra-t-elle à cacher ses ébats de princesse lubrique et à se rappeler de l'homme qui a pris sa virginité?

description.cs:
Veľká rodina Lombardi bola kedysi na vrchole impéria. Po smrti jej patriarchu sa osud rodiny a Firentie - nemanželskej dcéry, sa rúca do záhuby rukami jej neužitočných a krutých bratrancov. Jej otec zomrel, príbuzní ju vyhodili na ulicu a významná rodina, na ktorú bola taká hrdá, bola úplne zničená... Keď sa však prevtelí do svojho sedemročného ja, bude sa snažiť ochrániť česť rodiny, získať si priazeň starého otca Lulaca a zabrániť smrti vlastného otca. V tomto živote pre ňu existuje len jeden spôsob, ako zvíťaziť: stať sa hlavou ich mocného rodu.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B2%88-%EC%83%9D%EC%9D%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A3%BC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2473), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56566288)

description.en:
I've reincarnated as Firentia Lombardy, the illegitimate daughter of the wealthiest and most influential family in the Empire. I thought I was all set to have a comfortable and luxurious life… but it wasn't long before my beloved father died, my relatives kicked me out, and our family went bankrupt!!

To add insult to injury, I was hit by a carriage one day when I drank (a bit too much) booze to drown my sorrows… but my despair was only temporary. When I opened my eyes, I found that I'd traveled back in time to when I was 7 years old!

I was surprised to see my father again in the flesh. But as if that wasn't already shocking enough, the 2nd prince, our family's once sworn enemy, was now following me around like a dog!

Now that I've been given a second chance at life, I'll take things into my own hands and claim both the 2nd prince and my family for myself!

---
**Links:**
* Alternative Official English - [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/i-shall-master-this-family), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/9247)
description.fr:
Florentia s'est réincarnée comme l'enfant illégitime de la famille la plus riche de l'empire, même si elle n'était pas de sang pure elle pensait que tout irait bien, son père était gentil avec elle, mais à la mort de ce dernier sa famille l'a abandonnée et elle s'est retrouvée seule, puis soudainement le trou noir.

Elle se souvient d'avoir un peu bu puis avoir ressenti un violent coup sur la tête et maintenant elle est de retour dans son corps de 7 ans! L'occasion de tout changer et de devenir même en étant illégitime la cheffe de la famille!

---
La grande famille Lombardi était autrefois au sommet de l’Empire. Après la mort de son patriarche, le sort de la famille et celui de Firentia, née d’un Lombardi et d’un paysan, tombent en ruine aux mains de ses cousins inutiles et cruels. Mais lorsqu’elle se réincarne à l’âge de ses sept ans, elle fera tout pour protéger l’honneur de la famille, gagner les faveurs de son grand-père Lulac et, empêcher la mort de son père. Dans cette vie, il n’y a qu’un seul moyen pour elle de gagner: devenir la cheffe de leur puissante famille.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%B4%EB%B2%88-%EC%83%9D%EC%9D%80-%EA%B0%80%EC%A3%BC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EA%B2%A0%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2473), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56566288)

description.id:
Aku pikir aku adalah putri bangsawan yang hidupnya bergelimang harta dan kebahagiaan, tapi ternyata aku ini anak berdarah campuran bangsawan dan rakyat biasa yang keberadaannya tidak dianggap dalam keluargaku sendiri. Ibuku sudah tiada dan tidak ada yang menyayangiku kecuali ayahku sendiri. Setelah bekerja keras mengabdikan diri untuk keluarga ini, siapa sangka aku malah diusir dan berakhir mati tertabrak kereta kuda. Ketika terbangun lagi aku bereinkarnasi untuk kedua kalinya di tubuh yang sama.

---

description.ja:
今度こそ守れるんじゃないかな？ ランブル帝国随一の家門、ロンバルディを！ 交通事故で死んだ後ロンバルディ家の婚外子として転生したフィレンティア。 だが…彼女を待ち受けていたのは愛する父の死とロンバルディ家の滅亡だった。 家門の滅亡を知った日に彼女は酒を飲んで馬車に轢かれてしまうのだが、目を覚ますと7歳の自分に戻っていた。 今度こそ父と家門を守り抜くと決めたフィレンティア。 彼女を待ち構える試練とは一体何なのか… 当主になると決めた彼女の挑戦が始まるーー！

description.ko:
“한번 해 보자, 내가 가주가 되는 거야.”
환생에 회귀까지, 인생 3회차 피렌티아의 가주 되기 프로젝트!

제국 제일가는 명문가 롬바르디가의 막내 손녀 ‘피렌티아’. 그녀는 똑똑하고 능력 있지만 사생아로 태어났다는 이유로 친척들에게 온갖 수모를 당하고, 결국 가문에서 쫓겨나고 만다. 이후 피렌티아는 더 이상 가문 일에 참여할 수 없게 되고, 그저 무능력한 큰아버지의 손에 롬바르디가가 망해가는 것을 지켜볼 수밖에 없었다. 화가 나 술을 진탕 마신 어느 날, 피렌티아는 마차 사고를 당해 죽음을 맞이하는데…. 그러나 어떻게 된 일인지 눈을 떠 보니 거울에 비친 것은 일곱 살 때의 모습?! 전생의 기억을 가지고 회귀한 피렌티아는 다시 찾은 생에서는 롬바르디가의 멸문을 막기 위해 스스로 가주가 되기로 결심하는데…!

---

เมื่อเธอมาเกิดใหม่ในร่างของฟีเรนเทีย ลอมบาร์เดีย บุตรีแห่งตระกูลลอมบาร์เดีย หลังปู่ของเธอเสียไปเธอก็ถูกไล่ออกจากตระกูลและเพียงไม่นานตระกูลได้ล่มสลาย ฟีเรนเทียประสบอุบัติเหตุเสียชีวิตอีกครั้ง และย้อนกลับมาตอนอายุ 7 ขวบ ฟีเรนเทียที่ล่วงรู้อนาคตที่กำลังจะเกิดขึ้นทุกอย่างจึงพยายามแก้ไขทุกอย่างให้ดีขึ้น และมุ่งสู่เส้นทางการขึ้นเป็นผู้นำตระกูล...

description.uk:
"...спробуймо. Я очолю цю родину." Фірентія переродилася позашлюбною дитиною аристократа Ломбарді - наймогутнішої родини в імперії. Ба більше, історія цього роду тотожна історії держави Лембру! Ломбарді, знамениті своїми статками, обросли зв'язками та стали надійними покровителями для талановитих людей. Здавалось, що на Фірентію чекає світле майбутнє... Але її батько помер, а родичі, які прогнали дівчину, розвалили впливовий дім! Трохи (ні) випивши, вона потрапила під екіпаж на шляху додому. "Це занадто..." Фірентія знову розплющила очі семирічною дівчинкою. Тепер вона може врятувати татка і свою родину? А другий принц бігає за нею, немов відданий пес? Гаразд, тоді другий принц і дім Ломбарді належать їй!

description.vi:
Gia đình vĩ đại Lombardy, đã một thời đứng đầu đế quốc. Sau cái chết của chủ gia đình, số phận của gia đình và của cả Firentia, sinh ra từ một Lombardy và thường dân, rơi vào tay những anh em họ độc ác và vô dụng của cô ấy. Nhưng khi Firentia quay về cơ thể của mình vào năm 7 tuổi, cô ấy sẽ làm hết sức để bảo vệ danh dự của gia đình, lấy lòng người ông nội Lulac, và ngăn chặn cái chết của cha mình. Trong lần này, chỉ có một đường để Firentia thắng: trở thành mẫu hệ của gia đình vĩ đại này.

description.pt-br:
Florentia reencarnou como filha ilegítima da família mais rica do império. Ela pensou que tudo iria bem no futuro. Mas seu pai havia falecido, seus parentes a deixaram na porta, e a família honrada de que ela tanto se orgulhava estava completamente arruinada…. Mas isso é real? Ela bebeu um pouco (muito) e foi atropelada por uma carruagem, Quando ela abriu os olhos novamente, ela tinha sete anos? Além disso, o Segundo Príncipe, que era inimigo de sua família em sua vida anterior, está seguindo-a como um cachorro!

altTitles.pt-br: Tire proveito da habilidade do assassino  Proteja sua família, amor.
Um assassino lendário, reencarnou e se tornou a filha mais nova da família real

altTitles.en: The Legendary Assassin Reincarnated as the Beloved Youngest Daughter of a Royal Family.

altTitles.ja-ro: Densetsu no Ansatsusha, Tensei Shitara Ouke no Aisare Suemusume ni Natte Shimaimashite

description.pt-br:
“Babu-babu-babu-babu-babu-babu!?”
 (Estou me transformando em um bebê!?)

 Thoth, um assassino considerado uma lenda no submundo, é vendido por seus pais ainda jovem e criado estritamente como um assassino, por isso não conhece o amor de sua família.  Por capricho, ela salva um gato e morre, mas depois de morrer, está prestes a ser condenada ao inferno por tirar a vida de muitas pessoas.  No entanto, devido à sua boa ação de salvar um gato, ela pode reencarnar e renascer como a princesa do reino, Patricia.  Então, Deus ordena que ele salve os membros da família real – sua família.
 Ele deveria ter renascido como um bebê indefeso, mas suas habilidades de assassino não diminuíram e ele continua a lutar contra assassinos um após o outro.

 Aos poucos, surge o sentimento de querer proteger os membros da família real, que os amam incondicionalmente só porque são da família...?

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Kanashi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

title.en: Imprisoned with the Horror Game's Male Lead

altTitles.en: Confined Together with the Horror Game’s Male Lead

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en la sirvienta del protagonista de un juego de terror

description.en:
I became a maid inside of a horror game.
Penalties were given to the male lead, who was trying to escape being locked up in a large mansion, and I acted as a guide. 

I was going to fulfill my duties until the male lead’s play ends.

“When I get out, I’ll lock you up exactly the same way.”

The male lead is so noisy. 
If it’s going to be like this, I’ll just help him escape faster. 

“Let’s eat, Dietrich.”
“This is a potion, it’ll help you recover faster if you take it.”
“The hint to escape is over there…”

I fed him well to prepare for the next play, and when the male lead got hurt, I gave him a potion so he could quickly play the next game,
I even gave him a hint for the problem. 

You’ll be able to get out now, right?

However. 

“I don’t really know the answer.”

What’s the meaning of this? Aren’t you supposed to be smart?

…The male lead doesn’t think about leaving the mansion at all. 

“If you won’t get out, I will.”

I shouted in anger because I was so sick of the thought of having to see the face of someone I don’t want to keep seeing. 

“Is it possible for you to get out of here?”

His eyes sank bitterly. 

“Let me tell you this, I have no intention of leaving this place.”
“What?”
“And you have no way of getting out, either.”

What the hell is going on?

title.en: Food Truck Owner inside the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Food Truck Owner in the Dungeon

description.en:
"Don't yearn for a world different from yours, just live a normal life."

Hunters, dungeons, I'm not interested in any of them.
My life followed one single path that's of cooking.
But the moment I was about to open my first long-awaited food truck....

[Class: You have awakened as a Food Truck Owner (Hidden)!]
[Item: Dungeon Business Permit (Personal/Non-Transferable)!]
- Business is only possible inside the dungeon

Min Jiun, 21 years old, awakened as the owner of a food truck inside the dungeon.

title.en: Since I don't know about it, should we part ways, Your Majesty?

description.en:
Due to a carriage accident, Lumiere suffers from amnesia. 
While searching for her memories, she discovers a warning in her diary.

[Do not fall for him.]

At that time, a man claiming to be her lover appears.
“I know everything about you, even the parts you don't know yourself.”

This man, who doesn't exist in her memories.
But she finds herself increasingly attracted to him…

… Were we really lovers? Why did we break up?
Is approaching the truth really the right thing for me?
description.ko:
마차 사고로 인해 기억상실증에 걸린 르미에.
기억을 찾기 위해 본 일기장에서 경고를 발견한다.

[그를 사랑해선 안 돼.]

그때, 그녀의 연인이었다고 주장하는 남자가 찾아왔다.
"난 당신 스스로도 모르는 부분까지 전부 다, 알고 있으니까."

분명 기억 속엔 존재하지 않는 그.
하지만 그에게 점점 끌리는 자신을 발견하는데...

…진짜 우린 연인이었을까? 왜 헤어진 걸까?
진실에 다가서는 것이, 정말로 나를 위한 일이 맞을까?

description.en:
As the middle child who is neither the heir nor the cherished younger twins, Karina has lived her whole life hidden away from others. She, who only had one hobby of painting, found out that she only had one year left to live. So without a plan, she went to visit her fiancé who she barely knew… To annul the engagement as he always wanted.

"I won’t beat around the bush. I want to spend a year here."

"...Milady, have you gone crazy?"

"In return, I'll agree to annul the engagement."

But, she didn't know then. That she would receive the unconditional love that she had never received her whole life from him, and that she would come to have a desire to live her once meaningless life.

---
Though gifted with an ability to bring her drawings to life, Karina Leopold spent her years in the shadow of her famous siblings, forced to be the good daughter her parents wanted. But when she's told that a deadly disease will kill her in a year, she offers a deal to her fiancé, Milian Pastellio, with the goal to live the remainder of her days far from her family's reach. Much to her surprise, their encounter proceeds to change them both in a way she never imagined...

---

description.id:
Sebagai anak kedua, Karina menghabiskan hidupnya selalu mengalah pada kakak-adiknya. Suatu hari, dia diberitahu bahwa menggambar yang merupakan hobinya, membuat sisa hidupnya hanya tinggal satu tahun lagi. Tak ingin terus hidup tidak dianggap oleh keluarganya, dia memutuskan untuk pergi dari rumah. Dengan persiapan seadanya, dia pergi ke tempat tunangan yang tidak begitu dia kenal untuk menghabiskan sisa hidupnya.

description.it:
Come figlia di mezzo che non è né l'erede né gli amati gemelli più piccoli, Karina ha vissuto tutta la sua vita nascosta agli altri. Lei, che aveva un solo hobby della pittura, ha scoperto che le restava solo 1 anno di vita. Quindi senza un piano, è andata a trovare il suo fidanzato che conosceva a malapena... Per annullare il fidanzamento come aveva sempre voluto.

"Non voglio tergiversare. Voglio passare un anno qui."

"...Mia Signora, sei impazzita?"

"In cambio, accetterò di annullare il fidanzamento."

Ma allora non lo sapeva. Che avrebbe ricevuto l'amore incondizionato che non aveva mai ricevuto per tutta la vita da lui, e che sarebbe arrivata ad avere un desiderio per vivere la sua vita un tempo priva di significato.

description.ja:
家門の跡を継ぐ長子でも、家族の愛を独占できる末っ子でもない、中途半端な2番目として、いつも誰かの影で生きてきたカリナ。 絵を描くことが唯一の趣味だった彼女は、自分に残された時間があと少しだということを知り、今まで交流もなかった婚約者に会いに行くことに。 婚約破棄の書類を胸に抱いて… 「ここにいさせてください」 「正気か？」 「その代わり…婚約を破棄して差し上げます」 この時は思いもしなかった。あれほど望んだ無償の愛と関心を彼がくれることになるなんて。 そのせいで、どうでもよかった人生に未練を抱くことになるなんて…

description.ko:
가문의 후계자도, 귀여움을 독차지하는 막내도 되지 못한 어중간한 둘째로,
평생 다른 사람들에게 가려진 삶을 살아온 카리나. 
그림을 그리는 것만이 유일한 취미인 그녀는
자신에게 남은 시간이 고작 1년 뿐이라는 사실을 알게 된다. 

그래서 교류도 없던 약혼자를 무작정 찾아갔다.
그가 원하던 파혼 서류를 품에 고이 간직한 채.

"단도직입적으로 말하자면, 여기서 1년간 지내고 싶어요."
"......미쳤나, 영애?" 
“대신 파혼해 드릴게요.”

하지만 그땐 미처 알지 못했다. 
평생 가지지 못했던 대가 없는 관심과 애정을 그에게 받게 될 줄은.
그래서 미련 없던 삶에 이토록 욕심이 생기게 될 줄은.

description.ru:
Карина всю жизнь находилась в чужой тени. Абсолютно обычная, ни наследница рода, ни милашка, как ее младшие – близняшки. Однажды она узнает, что ей остался всего год. Поэтому она тут же помчалась к своему жениху, неся с собой заявление на расторжение брака, о котором ее жених, должно быть, так грезил.— Скажу прямо, я хочу прожить здесь год.— Миледи, вы с ума сошли?..— За это я дам вам развод.Вот только кое-чего она не знала.— Похоже, вы продолжаете делать вид, будто не замечаете, поэтому мне придется это сказать.— Скажите.— Вы мне нравитесь.Она никогда даже надеяться не смела, что просто так получит его расположение. Поэтому она и не думала, что у нее появится настолько сильное желание в жизни, к которой она не была готова.

description.uk:
Вона не була спадкоємицею сім'ї, або навіть милою і обожнюваною молодшою дитиною, але неоднозначною середньою дитиною, Карина, та, яка завжди буде затьмарювати інших. Дівчина, чиє єдине хобі полягало в тому, щоб малювати, дізналася, що їй залишилося жити всього один рік.
Так, вона раптом пішла в гості до свого нареченого, з яким у неї ніколи не було ніяких взаємодій. У її руках були документи, необхідні для анулювання їх заручин, так само, як він хотів.

"Чесно кажучи, я хочу жити тут один рік."
"...Ти збожеволіла, молода міс?"
"В обмін на це я розірву заручини."

Однак тоді вона не знала, що отримає всю увагу і прихильність, яку не отримувала все своє життя.

altTitles.ja: 支配少女くばるちゃん

description.en:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, "Give me your life."

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
description.ja:
熾烈ないじめの末に、もう死にたいと思っていた少年・木場優人（きばゆうと）。自殺する寸前に、奇妙なファンキー美少女・くばるに「君の人生を頂戴」と言われたことで、運命が目まぐるしく変わっていく。

ラブで君の人生を幸せにする？！ちょっと奇妙でサイコなラブドラマ。

altTitles.ja: BLEACH カラー版
ブリーチ
ブリーチ カラー版

description.en:
Ichigo Kurosaki has always been able to see ghosts, but this ability doesn't change his life nearly as much as his close encounter with Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper and member of the mysterious Soul Society. While fighting a Hollow, an evil spirit that preys on humans who display psychic energy, Rukia attempts to lend Ichigo some of her powers so that he can save his family, but much to her surprise, Ichigo absorbs every last drop of her energy. Now a full-fledged Soul Reaper himself, Ichigo quickly learns that the world he inhabits is one full of dangerous spirits, and along with Rukia, who is slowly regaining her powers, it's Ichigo's job to both protect the innocent from Hollows and to help the spirits themselves find peace.   
  
Monochrome version won the 50th Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.
description.es:
Ichigo Kurosaki siempre ha sido capaz de ver fantasmas, pero esta habilidad no cambia su vida tanto como su encuentro cercano con Rukia Kuchiki, una Segadora de Almas y miembro de la misteriosa Sociedad de las Almas. Mientras lucha contra un hueco, un espíritu maligno que se aprovecha de los humanos que muestran energía psíquica, Rukia intenta prestarle a Ichigo algunos de sus poderes para que pueda salvar a su familia, pero para su sorpresa, Ichigo absorbe hasta la última gota de su energía. Ahora que ya es un auténtico Segador de Almas, Ichigo aprende rápidamente que el mundo que habita está lleno de peligrosos espíritus y, junto con Rukia, que está recuperando lentamente sus poderes, el trabajo de Ichigo consiste en proteger a los inocentes de los huecos y ayudar a los propios espíritus a encontrar la paz.  
  
Versión monocroma ganó el 50º Premio Shogakukan Manga en la categoría Shounen.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do mangá Bleach. A história gira em torno de Kurosaki Ichigo um estudante de 15 anos que tem uma estranha capacidade de ver, tocar e falar com espíritos de pessoas mortas. Logo que o Shinigami (Deus da Morte) Kuchiki Rukia toma conhecimento dos poderes dele ela decide investigá-lo, e acaba em uma luta com um Hollow que foi atraído pelo forte poder espiritual de Ichigo, antes de ser derrotada pela criatura, Rukia passa seus poderes a Ichigo, o qual se torna um Shinigami, e após derrotar o Hollow ingressa em uma jornada para proteger os humanos e os espíritos da ameaça dos Hollows.

altTitles.ja: ダンジョン飯

description.en:
After his sister is devoured by a dragon and losing all their supplies in a failed dungeon raid, Laios and his party are determined to save his sister before she gets digested. Completely broke and having to resort to eating monsters as food, they meet a dwarf who will introduce them to the world of Dungeon Meshi - delicious cuisine made from ingredients such as the flesh of giant bats, walking mushrooms, or even screaming mandrakes.  
  
---
- **Ranked 1st in the 2016 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! for Male Readers (Shonen/Seinen)**
description.es: Después de que su hermana fuera devorada por un dragón y habiendo perdido todas sus provisiones, Laios y su equipo están decididos a salvar a Farin antes de que sea digerida por la gran bestia. Es así como conocen a un singular enano que los introducirá al mundo gastronómico de las mazmorras: delicias elaboradas a partir de la carne de murciélagos gigantes, hongos caminantes y mandrágoras chillonas.
description.id:
Seorang penjelajah muda, Laios, bersama kawan-kawannya mendapat serangan hebat dari seekor naga jauh di lantai terdalam Dungeon. Mereka kehilangan seluruh uang dan perbekalan, bahkan seorang anggota tim! Walau ingin bergegas kembali dan menyelamatkan rekannya, mereka dihalangi satu masalah besar, “Tanpa makanan dan uang, mereka pasti akan kelaparan di tengah penjelajahan!” Namun, Laios mendapat ide cemerlang, “Kita makan monster saja!”. Slime, kalajengking, basilisk, mandrake, dan kelelawar raksasa… Tidak ada satu monster pun yang luput dari perut-perut keroncongan di Dungeon!! (Gramedia.com) 

[Terjemah Indonesia](https://www.gramedia.com/search?q=delicious%20in%20dungeon)
description.pt-br:
Depois de perder todos os seus suprimentos e provisões e também ter sua irmã devorada por um dragão durante uma expedição na masmorra, Laios e seu grupo estão determinados a salvá-la antes que ela seja completamente digerida pelo dragão.
Mas estando completamente falidos e tendo que recorrer a comer monstros como alimento, eles encontram um anão que os apresentará ao mundo de Dungeon Meshi – uma deliciosa culinária feita com ingredientes como a carne de morcegos gigantes, cogumelos andarilhos e até mesmo mandrágoras.

description.en: ‘Meok Gwi-Sa’ is a Monster Hunter who eats monsters to protect the human world. After the release of the Hell demon, he lost his power. He managed to survive and met Goyoung. Goyoung, is a young individual with a petite build, who has endured a lifetime of torment due to his physical stature. His childhood friend, Kang Jong-bo, suddenly transforms into a bully during high school. However, their lives take an unexpected turn when Goyoung acquired a mysterious power which is the ability to devour monsters. Goyoung embarks on a perilous journey to protect humanity from the impending threat of the Gate to Hell. Will he be able to control his new powers and save the world from its impending doom?

Monk Sanzang from the "Journey to the west" has time slipped to the present-day Korea.   
  
She has lived her lifetime constantly fighting yokai but her most dangerous opponent turns out to be just one guy?!  
  
On the orders of Buddha, Monk Sanzang and her companions pilgramaged the Western regions in search of his teachings.  
Unlike Sun Wukong, Zhu Bajie, and Sha Wujing, who hoped to become gods in recognition of their contribution, rather than being tied down to the life of Buddhism, Sanzang wanted to remain in the human world and enjoy a new life as an ordinary human.  
  
But as she was being dragged to Heaven by orders from the Buddha, she notices a strange tunnel leading to the human world in which she escapes into…  
  
And the place where she fell is the Republic of Korea's Jeju Island!  
And she meets a guy named Lee Hyun?!  
  
The time-slipped Monk Sanzang a.k.a Hyeonjeong and the tsundere Lee Hyun's turbulent romance!

altTitles.ja: ゴーストフィクサーズ

description.en: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼ライジングサン   F I N A L S

altTitles.vi: Đội trưởng Tsubasa - Mặt trời mọc - Chung kết

description.en:
A web-comic continuation of Captain Tsubasa 9th arc: Rising Sun - The Final.

Rising Sun - FINALS is covering the 2nd half of the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain and beyond.

The web-comic came to be when on April 2024 mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, ending Rising Sun - The Final official published serialization half-way through the match opting to continue the story at his own pace with storyboard pencil sketches, publishing them on the official Captain Tsubasa World website.

A boy named Shi Shan and his little sister were offered as sacrifice to a demon that has been haunting their village. They were rescued by a martial artist who exorcised demons. He took the siblings in as his disciples and taught them the art of cultivation and about the demons that dwell in this world.

altTitles.ja: 咲ちゃんは淫魔の子（合掌）

description.en:
Saki-chan, a succubus, has fallen in love with Rokuhara, a son of a temple, of all people. She tries her best to talk to him, but her succubus blood runs wild and she always ends up tempting him. "I wish I could say I love you honestly!"

This is a story about a pure and simple love of a succubus who can't be honest.
description.ja: 「えっちだってだいじょうぶっ教!?」がSNSで大反響！ 待望の第1巻！ 淫魔の咲ちゃんが恋した相手は、よりにもよってお寺の息子の六原くん。頑張って話しかけようとしても淫魔の血が暴走して、ついつい誘惑してしまい――。「素直に好きと言えたらいいのに！」ぽんこつ可愛い淫魔のピュアピュアHな恋の行方は……!? 残念サキュバス×カタブツお寺男子の昇天上等、全力ラブコメ！

altTitles.ja: 俺は大魔導士だ！

description.en:
Sunghoon Lee is nothing but a victim of a changing world, a powerless man in a land infested with beasts and magic. Monsters from another world invaded earth, and they brought with them a sickness that pushes Sunghoon’s mother into an endless sleep. To pay off her medical bills, he braved a dangerous job as bait used by powerful superhumans called Awakeners to hunt monsters. But when he found himself at death’s door, the image of his past life flashes through his mind. There, he found his truth: he is the reincarnation of the Sorcerer King!

description.fr:
La planète a été envahie par des monstres, que seuls les sorciers peuvent chasser. Notre héros, simple humain, n'a pas vraiment d'autre choix que de jouer le rôle d’appât dans les chasses s’il veut un salaire décent. Mais un jour, blessé par une de ces créatures et sur le point de mourir, il se rappelle sa vie antérieure… en tant que roi des sorciers, rien que ça ! Armé de ses souvenirs et de ses nouveaux pouvoirs, sa vie devrait vite devenir intéressante.

description.ja:
10年前、次元が拗れてモンスターが溢れ出た。 同時に生まれたモンスター覚醒者たちは→モンスターを捕まえて大活躍をする。 「吉澤覚」は月に4回、お母さんの病院代を工面するために 覚醒者のハンティングを手伝って、 後処理をする危険千万の「ポーター」として活動をする。 そんな中でモンスターに大きな怪我を負ってから前世の記憶が戻ってくる… ”ん？俺死んだのか？” ”俺は前世に大魔導士のクラトゥラスだったじゃん！！” 前世の記憶を持った「吉澤覚」のパワハラ魔法が始まる！

description.ko:
10년 전, 차원이 비틀리며 몬스터가 쏟아져 나왔다.
동시에 생겨난 초능력 각성자들이 몬스터를 잡으며 대세가 되는데...

성훈은 한 달에 네 번, 어머니의 병원비를 마련하기 위해
각성자의 사냥을 돕고, 뒤처리하는 위험천만한 '짐꾼'으로 활동한다.

그러던 중 몬스터에게 큰 부상을 입고 전생을 기억하게 되는데...

"어라, 나 죽었나?"

"나 전생에 대마도사 크라투라스였잖아!!!"

전생의 기억을 가진 성훈의 갑질 마법이 시작된다!!

*********************
판타지 화제작 데카스펠 작가님의 <나는 마도왕이다> 본격 웹툰화!
세계를 휩쓰는 마도왕의 마법을 웹툰으로 만나 보세요!

description.ru:
10 лет назад орда монстров из разлома в пространстве и времени начала атаковать человечество. В то же время люди начали пробуждать силу и охотиться на монстров за славой и деньгами. Санхун, нуждающийся в деньгах из-за болезни своей матери, берёт опасную работу, помогая охотиться на этих монстров четыре раза в месяц в качестве приманки. Но однажды, оказавшись тяжело раненным, он вспомнит свою прошлую жизнь.  
«Я что, только что умер? Погоди-ка, я был королём-волшебником Кратра в прошлой жизни?!»

description.pt-br:
10 anos atrás, a horda de monstros da fenda formada da distorção do tempo e espaço iniciaram um ataque contra a humanidade. Ao mesmo tempo que, as pessoas começaram a despertar poderes e iniciaram uma caçada aos monstros em busca de fama e dinheiro. Lee SungHoon, à procura de dinheiro devido à doença de sua mãe, arruma um trabalho altamente perigoso, ajudando na caçada desses monstros bancando a isca para os caçadores, fazendo isso quatro vezes no mês. Mas, um dia, ele é gravemente ferido por um monstro e relembra de sua vida passada como o Rei dos Feiticeiros. "Hã? Eu acabei de morrer? Espera aí, eu era O Rei dos Feiticeiros Kuratauras na minha vida passada?" Com as memórias de sua vida anterior, o espetáculo do poder mágico esmagador de SungHoon se inicia.

altTitles.ja: エリスの聖杯 ～婚約破棄された令嬢は、稀代の悪女に助けられた代償として復讐に付き合わされます～

description.en:
Constance, the daughter to a Viscount whose only value is her honesty, and Scarlet Castiel, the most reviled villainess of the era who was sentenced to death ten years ago. When the two people who were never supposed to meet encountered one another at a night party, the story that should have ended with Scarlet's death began anew.  
  
Although their relationship only began out of mutual interest, they soon became true partners in an effort to unravel the mysteries of a grand conspiracy borne out of the past, that still has a vicious grip on the present.

altTitles.es: Una historia sobre una gal y una presidenta de comité que se reencuentran por coincidencia

description.en: After finishing her errands, Marina heads for the bus stop on her way home. However, there she runs into the drunken former committee chairwoman from her high school days. She thinks she doesn't remember her, but while she's taking care of her, she says to her, "You used to avoid me...," which is very meaningful to her...?

altTitles.ja: 聖くんは清く生きたい

altTitles.ne: हिजिरी-कुन एक पवित्र जीवन बिताउन चाहन्छ

altTitles.en: Hijiri-kun Wants to Live a Pure Life

altTitles.es-la: Hijiri-kun quiere vivir una vida pura

description.en:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!

This is an unusual romantic comedy for those of you who have things you can't tell others!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!
